feed.title: GitHub Kotlin Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Kotlin in GitHub

entry.title: android/kotlin-multiplatform-samples
entry.summary:
Samples showcasing the experimental Kotlin Multiplatform Jetpack libraries

Kotlin Multiplatform Samples

DiceRoller

DiceRoller is a sample app using the Kotlin Multiplatform DataStore library to store and observe preferences.
